channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Mission Shark
channel.desc: Steve Backshall is on a mission to create a new generation of shark saviours, but first he needs to find his team. In this episode, Steve takes 12 young UK hopefuls to boot camp with the challenge of choosing just six from the group. To earn their ticket to swim with sharks in a designated Shark Sanctuary in the Bahamas, the 12 have to complete a series of challenges, including swimming, a clifftop leap into water and a demanding abseil. With a weekend of training completed, who will Steve pick to be in his team.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Young Ben wants to win the Oddpool sandcastle competition. The band head to the beach, and Rio meets a sea genie who gives everyone a big surprise.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Little bro Callum sends Adam and Joe to the seaside to see who can build the greatest sandcastle in a bid to avoid the wheel of doom.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: When birds cause trouble aboard the Octoray, Tweak uses her Octowatch to help with repairs.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Finding an earth probe makes Dad homesick. When Big Lizard accidentally destroys it, Cosima knows what to do. She recreates the contents - Proxima-style.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: The Danger agents go undercover disguised as a family to find out why the world?s villains are heading to one holiday camp, Sidneyland. When Baron Greenback shows up, the team are convinced he?s up to no good, but can?t find any evidence of wrongdoing. When Penfold enters Squawk and DM in a dance competition they discover the prize is the fabled Helmet of Power, an ultimate invention bent on destruction.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: A snake bite causes Grizzly Griller to forget all his survival know-how, so it's down to his greatest fan Dennis to help him re-learn his survival skills and help them all make it safely back to Beanotown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes discover that their latest quest - delivering 30 birthday balloons to Mr Friendlyface?s cousin - isn?t as easy as they expected.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: As Adele says goodbye to The Next Step, she tries to mend fences with Olive. Things get complicated between Heath and Pascale as Anthony deals with Adele leaving.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Fuecoco does its best to quell a group of angry wild Pok?mon with song and dance.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Taffy
channel.desc: Mrs Muchmore is chosen to represent April in the country club?s calendar. Fuffernin will be there in a few hours to take the best picture possible, and everyone has to be dressed in green, from bow to toe.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: Trying to rescue Jess Gorman in an underwater cave proves dangerous for Ant and Fontaine until a manatee comes to their aid. But is it too late.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis's ultimate hero, Grizzly Griller, plans on trekking to the source of the River Beano, broadcasting the treacherous path on live TV. Dennis introduces him to his pet hamster Galahad - only to discover they are his biggest fear! Grizzly is so afraid that Dennis must disguise himself as his hero and go in his place.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Count Duckula is back, and he is determined to take over the world, one terrible TV show at a time.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: Two sisters arguing over tidying up their house end up with a bigger problem when the Ninjas deliver two cleaning robots from the future who are planning a robotic rebellion.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation. Set on a remote rural farm, Shaun's flock lives a peaceful life under the watchful eye of their sheepdog Bitzer. Shaun finds a camera which some ramblers have dropped and sets about taking snapshots of the flock. Bitzer is soon on the trail of the missing camera.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: K-Jam is moving into the neighbourhood and staying with the family for a while. However, Girl gets insecure and thinks that her awesome best friend is trying to take her place.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: During their quest to stop Balthazar the Fabulous from sucking every last sunbeam out of the sky, the heroes realise there is something wrong with Hoofius, who keeps tripping up and has totally lost his confidence. Herbert explains that Hoofius has lost his mojo! To help their friend and complete the quest, the heroes take Hoofius up Mojo Mountain to help him get his mojo back.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Olympia discovers a secret about her partner. Curriculum: Charts, line graphs, data analysis and collection.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Olympia discovers a secret about her partner. Curriculum: Charts, line graphs, data analysis and collection.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Duncan sees an opportunity for a break from daycare when an angry skunk hunts down Chef.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face a revolutionary enemy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: The Rising Volt Tacklers and the Explorers battle over the fate of Laqua.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: Graven dispatches two of his generals to Earth to claim the Shard of the Soul of Gorm, forcing the Scions to accelerate their training and protect the artifact. However, with the Scions mired in personal problems, the Gormiti must help them discover their inner strengths on, and off, the battlefield.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A-Troupers begin to switch over to Team Brawl, but when Olive and Eldon figure out a way back into regionals, Anthony and Ethan have their loyalties tested.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter Challenges
channel.desc: Does Joel have what it takes to pass the Royal Marines Commando Endurance course?! Squeezing through tunnels and getting soaked in water obstacles, followed by a gruelling run back to base, all against the clock.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: When a meteor shower is forecast to pass over Mossy Bottom, Bitzer really wants to see the shooting stars. However, he keeps getting distracted by the flock?s curiosity and the Farmer?s late-night picnic.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse and Penfold are introduced to Squawk?s latest invention ? a warp drive device that will transport HQ anywhere in the universe at a moment?s notice. Squawk?s demonstration seems to go without a hitch - that is until the gang notice an exact duplicate of the HQ across the road, with identical duplicates of the Danger Team inside. When the duplicate Big Head is activated and starts causing mayhem the two DMs join forces to try and stop her.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Walter attempts to ruin The Dinmakers' chance of reaching fame. He will stop at nothing - even wearing a frock and pretending to be a fan called Wanda who loves Dennis in order to break up the band.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: On a dark and stormy night, the kids tell a scary story about local legend Big Bad Ben! Mouse says he doesn't exist, but when a dark figure arrives at the house, they all believe it's Big Bad Ben - even Mouse! Who is this stranger in the storm? Can they work together to protect themselves? And, hang on, didn?t Cheese order pizza.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: It's time for the racket game, where big scores mean big prizes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings adopt a cute insect that eats wood. And what's made of wood? The cabin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: An agent-in-training visits the Mobile Unit.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: Trying to train Snorp is a complete catastrophe for the gang, leaving Charlie and Que 'feline' frustrated. As word spreads that he may become an 'outside pet', Snorp's enemies are coming for him.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes go on a quest to get Hoofius?s Toby Jug back from the depths of the Riddling Ruins and are faced with a series of puzzles and traps to solve.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: All the Pottsfield Leisure Centre staff are raising money for Comic Relief. Danny and Lance, as always, turn it into a competition to see which of them can raise the most money! But between Danny?s disastrously defective charity calendar, and Mick?s frankly frightening fancy dress, the brothers only succeed in driving the totaliser lower than when they started. It?s going to take everybody putting aside their rivalries and working together as a team to turn this situation around. That, and a lot of soggy sponges.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Get Arty
channel.desc: The Kwapongs set sail with homemade pirate ships, Sophie Ryder sculpts a huge Minotaur, and Harry Hill draws himself being chased by a very big, very blue cat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The mood of a raccoon becomes contagious to all those around him.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon: XY
channel.desc: A power unbound, a battle of legends.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Nitro and Phantom prank Fire at a kids' birthday party! The rest of the Gladiators have fun behind the scenes and pranking the audience at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: So Awkward Academy
channel.desc: It?s Superhero Day, but not everyone chooses to embrace their unique superpower. Luca turns super villain, Claire shuns her superfan and Mr Malone makes a super-awkward gaff.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gangnam Project
channel.desc: X-Key are gearing up for their TV appearance, unaware of the traitor in their midst, and, after a shocking revelation, Astra must do everything they can to pull off the impossible.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: Strange goings-on at Hawx Academy make the players worry the place is haunted. Jay struggles to settle in, while Alex is taunted by Hawx rivals Foxborough.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Mission Shark
channel.desc: Steve Backshall has chosen his UK team of six to travel with him to Bimini in the Bahamas, where they learn how to scuba dive and become the next generation of shark saviours. The mission begins as soon as they land, and they have just two weeks to complete four training dives, but first it?s time to meet four local Bahamian children who are also joining Steve?s team. On board the dive boat, they encounter their first shark species ? the Caribbean reef shark ? a deadly predator engineered for hunting underwater. Then it?s off to the dive location to start the first series of tests. Some of the team take to diving with ease and soon pass the preliminary stage of their training. For others, it is a much harder challenge, with the tasks proving too much at their first attempt.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: TV Stars Sam and Mark prank the Odd Socks, and there is an even bigger surprise when the lads start giving out awards for the best bits from the series - who will be the winners.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Online greeter extraordinaire Troy Hawke helps Callum challenge Adam and Joe to be the most complimentary to passers-by.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: When Kwazii and Calico Jack get stranded on an island, the Octonauts must search for them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: It's been one year since Cosima crash landed on Proxima, but no-one else has remembered this anniversary! Can a perfect picnic jolt their memories.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When a sudden urge to fly the Mark IV hits, Penfold leads a confused Danger Mouse to a farm, from which he claims to feel an unexplained magnetic pull. An entranced Penfold is met by a shadowy figure - Granny Penfold! Penfold recounts his childhood years on Granny?s farm, where he was trained in the ancient martial art of Farm Fu; a farming based martial art. Granny needs Penfold?s help to retrieve the sacred Fung Farm Book of Farm Fu, which has fallen into the hands of her enemies, causing farm animals to turn evil and rise up against their owners.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis and the gang train Bertie in the art of standing up to people so he can rebel against Walter's bossiness - but they train him too well and he becomes a dangerous rebel without a clue.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Whilst on a quest to return the Icicle of Destiny, Trevor topples into a cavern of tiny mushrooms who treat him like a king.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: An overprotective Heath accuses Grace of sabotage, while Grace and Jonah make a bet to make it on to A-Troupe. Meanwhile, Izzy grapples with keeping Anthony?s secret.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Liko, Mollie and their Pok?mon set out to save a Tandemaus pair separated by a storm.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Taffy
channel.desc: Every time Bentley steals Taffy?s bow, Taffy seems to find another one from nowhere. Bentley tries to find the source of his supply so that he can destroy it and finally expose Taffy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: The Aronnax and Alpheus?s sub are trapped within a giant jellyfish! They?ve been eaten and the jellyfish won?t let food out.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Pieface steals Professor Von Screwtop's Pastry-based Intelligent Espionage unit (PIE) after forming a strong bond with the pie-shaped robot. Pieface is dismayed when Walter steals it from him to protect his dad from the embarrassing footage the PIE's memory chip holds.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse's plan to hold a surprise party for Professor Squawkencluck is undone when the Baron releases killer birthday presents into the world.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: A fairy-tale princess being pestered by an annoying prince orders a new dragon from the Ninjas, who return with the most ferocious monster of them all - a T-Rex.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation. A circus sets up in a nearby field, and a spellbound Timmy wanders off to investigate. Can Shaun rescue him before the farmer notices he's gone.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, but the electricity supply stops in the log cabin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When the kids think that Mom may be pregnant, they set out to prove they will be great babysitters. Along the way, they learn that it's much harder to do it alone than it is together.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes are excited to visit Whizzpop?s Pop-Up Bakery and taste his magical cakes, but they are shocked to find that the protein bars have shouty raisins in them, the custard tarts are rock hard, and the floating sponges keep floating away! Trevor quests to solve the mystery, but having accidentally fallen into Whizzpop?s invisibility flour, how on earth will he get everyone?s attention.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The agents must come together to battle a common enemy. Curriculum: Charts, line graphs. Data Analysis and Collection.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The agents must come together to battle a common enemy. Curriculum: Charts, line graphs. Data Analysis and Collection.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter Challenges
channel.desc: Challenges, celebrities, makes and adventures with the Blue Peter team.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir unknowingly face Queen Mayor.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: After 100 years, the secrets of Laqua finally come to light.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: Just as the Scions start coming into their own, harnessing their potential as a team, all their hard-won progress comes to a halt when they attempt the ultimate Scion ability: Fusion. The unexpected outcome endangers both Carter and Myridell while giving Graven another strategic advantage.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Kenzie helps Pete make a difficult decision. The Brawl?s love theme gets in the way of Heath and Daisy fixing their friendship, and Michelle turns to Eldon for Brawl advice.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dragons: Legend of the Boneknapper Dragon
channel.desc: Animated short. When Gobber's house burns down, the old Viking is convinced that his nemesis, the legendary Boneknapper dragon, is responsible. Bent on revenge, Gobber resolves to hunt it down once and for all, despite the fact that no one believes the dragon exists. Regardless, Hiccup and the gang decide to accompany him for his own good. On the sea voyage, Gobber tells the story of his rivalry with the beast, which gets sillier with each episode. When the gang find themselves shipwrecked on the suspected island of the beast, they finally learn the truth about the dragon.
